com.iha.emulator.control.task

Class SimulationTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iha.emulator.control.task.SimulationTask

  • public class SimulationTask
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates and controls simulation task. Also contains all information gathered while simulation runs. Task can be only in one SimulationTask.State at a time. All actions (start, pause, stop, etc.) are dependent on current state of simulation.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimulationTask

        public SimulationTask()
        Creates new instance with default SimulationTask.State (READY)

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()

        Depending on SimulationTask.State, method either starts task by creating adapters (sensors) and enabling them, or restarts task, so it can be started again. Shows progress dialog.

        State:
        READY,PAUSED - creates adapter (if they are not already created) and enables them.
        FINISHED - restarts task, so it can be started again

      • pause

        public javafx.concurrent.Task pause()

        Depending on SimulationTask.State, method disables all created adapters, so they cannot send data to server. Shows progress dialog.

        State:
        ERROR,RUNNING - disables adapters

        Returns:
        Task task responsible for pausing the simulation

      • stop

        public javafx.concurrent.Task stop()

        Depending on SimulationTask.State, method stops task, deletes adapters and finalize task. Shows progress dialog.

        State:
        RUNNING,PAUSED,ERROR - if not paused, pauses task. Then deletes adapters,saves log file and clear memory so next task can be started

        Returns:
        Task task responsible for stopping the simulation

      • restart

        public javafx.concurrent.Task restart()

        Depending on SimulationTask.State, method restarts task to it's initial state, so it can be started again

        State:
        ERROR,FINISHED - clears logs, clears responses, resets timers

        Returns:
        Task task responsible for restarting the simulation

      • criticalStop

        public void criticalStop()
        Method called, when serious error occurred. Changes task SimulationTask.State to ERROR and immediately stops task.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Deletes log

      • pauseSensors

        public void pauseSensors()
        Method disconnects all created sensors from their adapters, so they cannot generate new messages.

      • resumeSensors

        public void resumeSensors()
        Method connects all created sensors to their adapters, so they can generate new messages.

      • createAdapters

        public void createAdapters(javafx.beans.property.LongProperty progress)
        Creates adapters and their sensors according to information in TaskParameters. Adapters IDs start from TaskParameters.getStartId() and increment by 1 for each new adapter. All created adapters are added to adapterControllers list.
        Parameters:
        progress - progress indicator

      • createSensors

        public int createSensors(AdapterController adapterController)
        Creates sensors for adapter given as parameter. Uses TaskParameters for information for random generators (sensors count, refresh time,..). For each sensor is created 1 value. Sensors ignore refresh times given by server, they always use initially generated random refresh time.
        Parameters:
        adapterController - adapter, for which are new sensors created
        Returns:
        number of successfully created sensors

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Deletes simulation task from application. Closes logs, clears responses from server and adapters from memory.

      • logMessage

        public void logMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Write message to task's log
        Parameters:
        message - message to be written to log

      • saveToXml

        public org.dom4j.Document saveToXml(org.dom4j.Document doc)
        Creates Dom4j XML element in given document. Saves all information about simulation task needed for later loading this task. Creates documents root element.
        Parameters:
        doc - XML document
        Returns:
        XML document with information about simulation task

      • createServer

        public ServerController createServer(boolean conn,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String ip,
                                     int port,
                                     java.lang.String databaseName)
        Creates new instance of ServerController containing Server model with information given as parameters.
        Parameters:
        conn - connection status. True if connected, false otherwise.
        name - name of the server
        ip - IP address or hostname of server
        port - server port
        databaseName - name of database storing data
        Returns:
        new instance if server controller

      • createServer

        public ServerController createServer(Server model)
        Creates new instance of ServerController for Server model given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        model - server model
        Returns:
        new instance of server controller

      • createLog

        public void createLog(javafx.scene.control.TabPane panel)
        Creates and initializes new instance of AdapterLogger and assigns it variable log. Also assigns criticalStop() to logs error handler.
        Parameters:
        panel - parent GUI component for new logs

      • createTaskParameters

        public TaskParameters createTaskParameters(int adaptersCount,
                                           Protocol.Version version,
                                           int startId,
                                           int sensorsCountMin,
                                           int sensorsCountMax,
                                           int refreshTimeMin,
                                           int refreshTimeMax,
                                           java.lang.String saveDir)
        Creates new instance of TaskParameters with information given as parameters and creates random generators.
        Parameters:
        adaptersCount - number of adapters, to be created
        version - protocol version, to be used
        startId - ID of first adapter, others are assigned ID incremented by 1
        sensorsCountMin - minimal number of sensors to be created
        sensorsCountMax - maximal number of sensors to be created
        refreshTimeMin - minimal refresh time for each sensor
        refreshTimeMax - maximal refresh time for each sensor
        saveDir - path to directory containing log
        Returns:
        new instance if task parameters

      • createStopCondition

        public StopCondition createStopCondition()
        Creates new instance of StopCondition class and assigns it to stopCondition
        Returns:
        new instance of stop condition

      • finishStop

        private void finishStop(javafx.concurrent.Task<java.lang.Object> worker)

        Shows progress dialog for given task and changes it's state according to task success. Also if simulation task queue is set to autorun, calls next simulation task.

        State:
        !ERROR - sets tasks state to FINISHED

        Parameters:
        worker - task, for which is to be shown progress dialog

      • clearResponseTracker

        private void clearResponseTracker()
        Clears all saved responses from ResponseTracker. If no response tracker is created yet, method creates new instance.

      • clearMessageTracker

        private void clearMessageTracker()
        Clears all message counters in MessageTracker.

      • createGenerators

        private void createGenerators()
        Creates random generators with seeds set in previously createdTaskParameters

      • restartStopConditions

        private void restartStopConditions()
        Sets stop conditions to initial state.

      • removeAdaptersFromDb

        private void removeAdaptersFromDb()
        Creates new DeleteAdapterTask and attempts to delete adapters created by simulation task from database. Emulator server must be running on server so this task can be successfull.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns simulation task's name as - Task/(task ID).
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        simulation task's name
